section.37: The Book of Fighting [The Prohibition of Bloodshed]

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Bakrah said:"I heard the Messenger of Allah [SAW] say: 'If two Muslims confront each other with their swords and one of them kills the other, both the killer and the slain will be in Hell.'" They said: "O Messenger of Allah, (we understand about) the killer, but what about the one who is killed?" He said: "He wanted to kill his companion
